parameter.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
	var gts = gts || [];

	gts.push(["id", "{{Google Customer Reviews Store ID}}"]);
	gts.push(["badge_position", "{{Google Customer Reviews Badge Position}}"]);
	gts.push(["locale", "{{Locale Code}}"]);
	gts.push(["google_base_offer_id", "{{Product ID}}"]);
	gts.push(["google_base_subaccount_id", "{{Google Customer Reviews Subaccount ID}}"]);

	(function() {
		var gts = document.createElement("script");
		gts.type = "text/javascript";
		gts.async = true;
		gts.src = "https://www.googlecommerce.com/trustedstores/api/js";
		var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
		s.parentNode.insertBefore(gts, s);
	})();
</script>
